extends java.lang.Object

Util for creating xml constructs within a DOM to satisfy an XPath query

Method Detail

findOrCreateXPath

public static org.w3c.dom.Node findOrCreateXPath(java.lang.String aPath,
                                                 org.w3c.dom.Document aTargetDoc,
                                                 IAeCopyOperationContext aContext,
                                                 IAeNamespaceContext aNamespaceContext)
                                          throws AeBusinessProcessException
Finds or creates the node indicated by the passed path and returns it. Acceptable paths are of a form /a/b[#index]/@abc.

Parameters:
aPath - The path to find or create.
aTargetDoc - The context root to create the path within.
aContext - Context for the copy operation
aNamespaceContext - Resolves any namespace prefixes (will be the same as the aContext param except for propertyAliases.)
Returns:
The node found or created matching the path.
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException - Thrown if problem with path.

createIndexedNode

protected static org.w3c.dom.Node createIndexedNode(java.lang.String aIndexExpr,
                                                    org.w3c.dom.Node aCurrentNode,
                                                    IAeCopyOperationContext aContext,
                                                    IAeNamespaceContext aNamespaceContext)
                                             throws AeBusinessProcessException
Accepts an expression representing an index number for the replication or finding within the parent of the passed node.

Parameters:
aIndexExpr - The index expression to evaluate
aCurrentNode - The node which will be replicated until index is reached
aContext - Copy operation context
aNamespaceContext - Resolves namespace prefixes
Returns:
the indexed node
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException - If error creating or finding the nodes
